Text: ever since I saw all the publicity this got on reddit, I've been searching for this film and surprised it went under the radar. i've been looking for this on TPB for a VERY long time. maybe a year now, have looked maybe 30 times now and now I can't wait to watch it. thanks

XviD and .avi are so over.

Downloaders, please favor x264 and .mp4 or .mkv (if you haven’t tried it yet, do yourself that favor).  Then maybe the kind uploaders will see the light too.

AVI master race!!!

Keep 'em coming TvTeam!
